TopicTitle: Add some B9 parts as high tier plane parts

Articles.Content: Add some B9 parts as high tier plane parts,please. It would be really nice to have it like really advanced at the end of the tech tree. It would also fit the style of the Hanger.
B9 is a mod, so if you want this you should go ask the Creator of B9 for it. I don't think squad generally adds mod parts (KSPX excluded).
B9 already has an assigned tech node all for itself in the tree, so it's most likely all parts will go there once it's updated. Since this isn't about the game, I'll close this now.
